text: The 2000 Plymouth City Council election was held on 4 May 2000 to elect members of Plymouth City Council in England. This was on the same day as the other local elections. The entire council was up for election and the Conservative Party gained control of the council from the Labour Party. ==Overall results== |- | colspan=2 style="text-align: right; margin-right: 1em" | Total | style="text-align: right;" | 60 | colspan=5 | | style="text- align: right;" | 61,643 | style="text-align: right;" | ==Ward results== ===Budshead (3 seats)=== Location of Budshead ward ===Compton (3 seats)=== Location of Compton ward ===Drake (3 seats)=== Location of Drake ward ===Efford (3 seats)=== Location of Efford ward ===Eggbuckland (3 seats)=== Location of Eggbuckland ward ===Estover (3 seats)=== Location of Estover ward ===Ham (3 seats)=== Location of Ham ward ===Honicknowle (3 seats)=== Location of Honicknowle ward ===Keyham (3 seats)=== Location of Keyham ward ===Mount Gould (3 seats)=== Location of Mount Gould ward ===Plympton Erle (3 seats)=== Location of Plympton Erle ward ===Plympton St Mary (3 seats)=== Location of Plympton St Mary ward ===Plymstock Dunstone (3 seats)=== Location of Plymstock Dunstone ward ===Plymstock Radford (3 seats)=== Location of Plymstock Radford ward ===Southway (3 seats)=== Location of Southway ward ===St Budeax (3 seats)=== Location of St Budeax ward ===St Peter (3 seats)=== Location of St Peter ward x ===Stoke (3 seats)=== Location of Stoke ward ===Sutton (3 seats)=== Location of Sutton ward ===Trelawny (3 seats)=== Location of Trelawny ward ==References== Category:2000 English local elections Category:May 2000 events in the United Kingdom 2000 Category:2000s in Devon
title: 2000 Plymouth City Council election
